post_title: Where can I get vinyl-records in kosovo?

comments.author: qaposhoh
comments.body: Unique Antique eshte nje lokal ne Fushe Kosove, nashta aty munesh me gjet diqka qe te pelqen

comments.author: Same-Platform-9793
comments.body: No shops as far as i know, maybe only a few coffe bars that have them on display as vintage items

comments.body:
